Html:
Is there a way to create a .ps (PostScript file) with phpExcel?  I am creating a large batch of excel documents at a time and would liek to be able to then create the .ps file and place them in the spooling directory to print automatically if the user chooses to do so.  I am using this on a small network and not on a live web server.

Great script.  Thanks for the help.

Nick
Sorry, but PHPExcel cannot create PostScript files. This may be out of the scope for this project at the moment.

Hi.

This functionality is available in version PHPExcel-develop?

Thanks for the help

Diogo
